pageContext.claim: “It is my pleasure to announce that @StephenMoore, a very respected Economist, will be nominated to serve on the Fed Board. I have known Steve for a long time – and have no doubt he will be an outstanding choice!”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear how long President Trump has known Stephen Moore. Several prominent economists have suggested Moore is not qualified for the role. He does not hold a Ph.D. in economics, the standard qualification for being called an "economist." He only earned a master's degree in economics.
